m_GetMainList.description: Main List: Employees in Dept with WorkTime (Join TWINSA_MASTER & TWINSA_WORKTIME)
m_GetMainList.sql: SELECT A.DEPT, B.DEPTNAME, A.SABUN, A.NAMEK, A.JIKWI, A.STATUS, C.WORKTIME, C.OVERTIME FROM TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_MASTER A LEFT JOIN TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_DEPT B ON A.DEPT = B.DEPT LEFT JOIN TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_WORKTIME C ON A.SABUN = C.SABUN AND C.WORKDATE = :work_date WHERE A.DEPT = :dept_code ORDER BY A.SABUN

m_GetSubList.sql: SELECT YYYYMM, SABUN, DEPTCODE, DAY01, DAY02, DAY03, DAY04, DAY05, DAY06, DAY07, DAY08, DAY09, DAY10, DAY11, DAY12, DAY13, DAY14, DAY15, DAY16, DAY17, DAY18, DAY19, DAY20, DAY21, DAY22, DAY23, DAY24, DAY25, DAY26, DAY27, DAY28, DAY29, DAY30, DAY31, REMARK FROM TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_WORKDAILY WHERE YYYYMM = :yyyymm AND DEPTCODE = :dept

m_GetCallList.sql: SELECT SABUN, REMARK, FROMTIME, TOTIME FROM TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_WORK_CALL WHERE CALLDATE = :date

m_GetMasterList.sql: SELECT A.SABUN, A.NAMEK, A.DEPT, A.JIKWI, A.STATUS FROM TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_MASTER A WHERE A.DEPT = :1 ORDER BY A.SABUN

m_UpdateWorkTime.sql: UPDATE TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_WORKTIME SET WORKTIME = :workTime, OVERTIME = :overTime WHERE SABUN = :sabun AND WORKDATE = :date

m_InsertWorkRecord.sql: INSERT INTO TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_WORKTIME (WORKDATE, SABUN, WORKTIME, OVERTIME) VALUES (:date, :sabun, :workTime, :overTime)

m_GetDeptList.sql: SELECT DEPT, DEPTNAME FROM TW_MIS_ADM.TWINSA_DEPT WHERE DELMARK IS NULL ORDER BY DEPT
